contents:
Fox News Ends Year With Top Ratings

In spite of a year marred with scandal, Fox News has received top ratings for a news network in both overall viewership and the coveted 25-54 demographic. What do you think?


“What can you do? People love to be filled with hate and rage.”

WILL SCHNEIDER • PICTURE FRAMER


“I’m not going to trust these figures unless I hear them from Fox News.”

PATRICIA WEEK • BASKETBALL PUMPER



“Hey, I get it—Sometimes you just need a break from reality.”

JORDAN HARDAWAY • SYSTEMS ANALYST


😂😂😂



https://www.theonion.com/fox-news-ends-year-with-top-ratings-1821498182
